widgets.content:
Transform your Nextcloud into a powerful collaborative workspace. IntraVox brings beautiful, SharePoint-style pages to your organization.

No coding required – Just drag, drop, and create!

IntraVox is a visual page builder for Nextcloud that empowers your team to create rich content pages with text, images, links, and files. Design professional layouts with 1-5 column grids and collaborate in real-time – everyone sees updates instantly. Support multiple languages with automatic content localization. Stay secure – all data stays in your Nextcloud.

Company Intranets – Share news, policies, and company updates

Knowledge Bases – Document processes and procedures

Department Portals – Give each team their own space

Project Hubs – Centralize project resources

Team Wikis – Collaborate on shared knowledge

Create Your First Page:

1. Click "+ New Page" in the top navigation
2. Enter a meaningful title for your page
3. Click "Edit" to enter editing mode
4. Start adding widgets using the toolbar buttons
5. Drag widgets to arrange your layout
6. Click "Save" when finished

Pro Tip: Start with headings to structure your content, then fill in the details!

Add rich text with full Markdown support: Bold, Italic, bullet and numbered lists, links, blockquotes, and code blocks.

Perfect for paragraphs, instructions, and general content.

Add visual impact with images.

Size Options: Small (300px), Medium (500px), Large (800px), or Full width (100%).

Upload to images folder or use external URLs. Always add alt text for accessibility!

Link Widget – Quick access to pages, websites, and files

File Widget – Embed PDFs, documents, and media

Divider Widget – Separate sections visually

Create beautiful, organized pages with ease!

IntraVox uses a flexible grid system that makes professional layouts easy.

Choose Your Columns:
1 column – Great for focused, article-style content
2 columns – Perfect for side-by-side comparisons
3 columns – Ideal for feature showcases
4-5 columns – Maximum flexibility for dashboards

Arrange Your Content:
Drag widgets between columns, drop into different rows to reorganize, mix widget types for visual variety.

Mobile responsive – your layouts look great on all devices!
